Player History
Drafted in 37th round, 579th overall pick, by Houston in 2015...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 3/2/2017 to a 1-year deal worth $612,000 per year...
Earned first career win on 5/10/2017...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 2/13/2018 to a 4-year deal worth $3,750,999 per year...
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 2019...
Traded from Cincinnati to Brooklyn on 2/1/2020 (Going to BRO: 1B Pedro Sol, P Maels Tomas, P Randall Joseph. Going to CIN: LF Andre Winston, 2B Steven Mora, P Richard Thomas, P Zachary Pietrzak).
..
Injured on 4/24/2021 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
9/21/2021: Signed a contract extension with Brooklyn, $3,500,000 per year, for 2 years.
